posts.title: Choosing the Sensor Approach: Commercial Fishfinder vs DIY Sonar
posts.excerpt: Documenting the decision to use the Open Echo project for DIY sonar instead of commercial fishfinders. Covers the trade-offs, hardware choices, and inspiration from related work.

posts.title: Project Kickoff: Building a Lake Mapping USV
posts.excerpt: Welcome to the DIY Lake USV Mapping project! This is the beginning of our journey to create an open-source solution for mapping lake depths using consumer fishfinder equipment.
